author: Brian Turner
method: Heat the oil in a wok. Add the pork and cook for two to three minutes. Add the remaining ingredients and sauté for another five minutes. Transfer to a dish and serve warm.
ingredients: 1 tbsp oil,  110g/4oz pork fillet, thinly sliced,  55g/2oz purple sprouting broccoli, chopped,  ½tin water chestnuts, diced,  ½red pepper, de-seeded and sliced,  2 baby leeks, sliced,  2 tbsp soy sauce
